resources.string: Please input your mass and height.
OMG! I\'m so skinny that I have to go to the hospital!
Can someone give me some food? I\'m hungry :(
Well... I can\'t say I don\'t like donuts! But for sure gym is not place for me :/
If there could be the most tragic catastrophy in the world\'s history - for me it would be McDonald\'s closing all of their restaurants :(
Counted via BMI Calculator app from Szymon Marcinkiewicz.
Share BMI with your friends now!

My name is Szymon Marcinkiewicz. I'm II year student of Computer Science at Wroc≈Çaw University of Science and Technology.

 I fell in love with programming when I came to University. Developing had immediately became my best hobby I have ever had.
